titleStmt.title: Youth's comedy, or, The souls tryals and trivmph a dramatic poem, with divers meditations intermixt upon several subjects, set forth to help and encourage those that are seeking a heavenly countrey / by the author of Youth's tragedy.
titleStmt.author: T. S. (Thomas Sherman)

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Sherman by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
